text: The 2016–17 Ranji Trophy is the 83rd season of the Ranji Trophy, the first- class cricket tournament in India. It is being contested by 28 teams divided into three groups. Groups A and B comprise nine teams and Group C comprises ten teams. Mumbai finished top of Group A, qualifying for the knockout stage of the tournament, along with Gujarat and Tamil Nadu. ==Points table== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! style="width:120px"|Team ! style="width:25px"| ! style="width:25px"| ! style="width:25px"| ! style="width:25px"| ! style="width:25px"| ! style="width:25px"| ! style="width:40px;"| |- style="background:#cfc;" |style="text- align:left"|Mumbai | 8 || 3 || 0 || 5 || 0 || 30 || +0.027 |- style="background:#cfc;" |style="text-align:left"|Gujarat | 8 || 2 || 0 || 5 || 1 || 26 || +0.368 |- style="background:#cfc;" |style="text- align:left"|Tamil Nadu | 8 || 2 || 1 || 5 || 0 || 26 || +0.164 |- |style="text-align:left"|Punjab | 8 || 2 || 1 || 5 || 0 || 21 || +0.109 |- |style="text-align:left"|Bengal | 8 || 2 || 1 || 4 || 1 || 21 || –0.235 |- |style="text-align:left"|Madhya Pradesh | 8 || 2 || 1 || 5 || 0 || 20 || +0.024 |- |style="text-align:left"|Uttar Pradesh | 8 || 1 || 4 || 3 || 0 || 13 || –0.124 |- |style="text-align:left"|Baroda | 8 || 1 || 3 || 4 || 0 || 10 || –0.003 |- |style="text-align:left"|Railways | 8 || 1 || 5 || 2 || 0 || 10 || –0.368 |} ==Fixtures== ===Round 1=== \---- \---- \---- ===Round 2=== \---- \---- \---- ===Round 3=== \---- \---- \---- ===Round 4=== \---- \---- \---- ===Round 5=== \---- \---- \---- ===Round 6=== \---- \---- \---- ===Round 7=== \---- \---- \---- ===Round 8=== \---- \---- \---- ===Round 9=== \---- \---- \---- ==See also== * 2016–17 Ranji Trophy * 2016–17 Ranji Trophy Group B * 2016–17 Ranji Trophy Group C ==References== ==External links== * Series home at ESPN Cricinfo Category:Ranji Trophy seasons Ranji Trophy Trophy Ranji Trophy Ranji Trophy
